amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? REDUCTION IN APPROPRIATIONS ? SEC. . Appropriations made in this Act are hereby reduced in the amount of $213,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to cut the total level of funding appropriated by the Act by 1%.
